roleset.name: provide funding for
roleset.note: BANKROLL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'bankroll' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from bankroll.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: hollywood glitz
example.text: Their stock in trade as ``executive producers'' is sniffing out hot properties, locking them up and then getting big studios to bankroll and distribute them.
